name: Cubed in
description:
WARNING: IF YOU HAVE NOT BEATEN CUBIN' YOU WILL STRUGGLE

This game is a Halloween special of the game Cubin'!

Every year in September-October it will be receiving updates from my Twitch chat! (patches and audio changes will be done when I feel like it)

GAMEPAD SUPPORT IS HERE!!!!!

A to Jump X to collect the diamond and move on Left Joystick to move!

psst: you can use shift as jump too :)
